jobDescription: 181267 Operations Data Analyst (Open)The Seagate Cloud Systems Operations Team is seeking a highly motivated, resourceful and data-driven Operations Data Analyst in Longmont, CO. This position will provide a highly motivated, engaged professional the opportunity to gain experience in developing analytical tools. The ideal candidate is someone who is a fast learner, innovative, wants a challenge, and is eager to make an impact.
